headline.main: New Springsteen Album Coming on March 6

docs.snippet: Bruce Springsteen's new album, coming out March 6, is called "Wrecking Ball."...
docs.abstract: Bruce Springsteen's new album, coming out March 6, is called "Wrecking Ball."
docs.lead_paragraph: Bruce Springteen announced on his Web site Thursday that he would release a new album, "Wrecking Ball," on March 6, and he released the lead-off single to whet the appetite of his fans. Called "We Take Care of Our Own," the track is musically upbeat but alludes to the economic and political climate in the United States, with lyrics like "Where's the promise, from sea to shining sea?"

headline.main: After This Year, No More Tax Refund Loans

docs.snippet: This is the last tax season that banks will be offering refund-anticipation loans....
docs.abstract: This is the last tax season that banks will be offering refund-anticipation loans.

headline.main: After This Year, No More Tax Refund Loans

docs.snippet: This is the last tax season that banks will be offering refund-anticipation loans....
docs.abstract: This is the last tax season that banks will be offering refund-anticipation loans.
docs.lead_paragraph: 1/20/12 | Updated with elaboration on loan terms and comment from Republic Bank and Jackson Hewitt.This is the last tax season that any banks will be offering "refund anticipation loans," according to the National Consumer Law Center.  The loans, called R.A.L.'s in the industry, are short term, repaid with a borrower's income tax refund. Typically, the loans carried fat fees and were marketed through tax-preparation outlets to lower-income borrowers who wanted fast cash.

headline.main: On Our Radar: House Panel Summons Clinton on Keystone Pipeline

docs.snippet: Testimony by Secretary of State Clinton would highlight the pipeline divide, which Congressional Republicans have turned into an election-year issue....
docs.abstract: Testimony by Secretary of State Clinton would highlight the pipeline divide, which Congressional Republicans have turned into an election-year issue.

headline.main: On Our Radar: House Panel Summons Clinton on Keystone Pipeline

docs.snippet: Testimony by Secretary of State Clinton would highlight the pipeline divide, which Congressional Republicans have turned into an election-year issue....
docs.abstract: Testimony by Secretary of State Clinton would highlight the pipeline divide, which Congressional Republicans have turned into an election-year issue.
docs.lead_paragraph: Fred Upton, the Republican chairman of the House Energy and Commerce Committee, says a subcommittee has asked Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton to testify next week on the Obama administration's decision not to approve the Keystone XL pipeline. The pipeline project has emerged as a deeply partisan election-year issue. [The Hill]

docs.snippet: A partial list of the former candidate's greatest mis-hits....
docs.abstract: A partial list of the former candidate's greatest mis-hits.

headline.main: So Long, Farewell, Rick Perry Goodbye

docs.snippet: A partial list of the former candidate's greatest mis-hits....
docs.abstract: A partial list of the former candidate's greatest mis-hits.
docs.lead_paragraph: The only thing more puzzling than Rick Perry's decision to drop out of the presidential race two days before the next primary, in South Carolina, was his decision to skip New Hampshire and put all of his hopes on that state. That's not counting his decision to run in the first place.

headline.main: Nagging Injury Wave Hits N.B.A. Stars

docs.snippet: The list of who’s ailing reads like the All-Star ballot — Kobe Bryant, Carmelo Anthony, Dirk Nowitzki, Chris Paul — but it is hard to pinpoint the exact reason for the rash of injuries....
docs.abstract: The list of who’s ailing reads like the All-Star ballot — Kobe Bryant, Carmelo Anthony, Dirk Nowitzki, Chris Paul — but it is hard to pinpoint the exact reason for the rash of injuries.
